thought i was doing ok hours passed and i could not breathe so i took some medication too much medication i slept it off the next day i called the doctor i could not breathe before the appointment so i took some benzos too many benzos i thought i was ok to drive i must have been wrong i was arrested for ovi i lost my license my job my freedom but most importantly my good name my pdoc basically told me i am a piece of shit and that i am helpless and i finally agree i have a few things left to do and then i clock-out for good i have lived my life to the fullest and there is not anything left i thought this would be harder but all i feel is peace
